languages.text: "Желание лично навести порядок похвально. Или говорит о критической некомпетентности ваших блюстителей, Версериан".
languages.translation_comment:
The RT has visited the lower decks.
Abelard: "A Lord Captain who graces the freight line with visits and speaks to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never sounded more tempting!"

languages.text: "The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or else, it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."
languages.translation_comment:
The RT has visited the lower decks.
Abelard: "A Lord Captain who graces the freight line with visits and speaks to the lowliest of serfs... Retirement has never sounded more tempting!"
languages.original_text: "Желание лично навести порядок похвально. Или говорит о критической некомпетентности ваших блюстителей, Версериан".

traits.locale_text: "The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."
"The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."
"The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or else, it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."
"The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or else, it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."
"The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or else, it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."
"The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or else, it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーの自分の船の管理をしたいという願いは称賛に値する。そうでなければ、お前の執行官たちの重大な無能さを示しているぞ、ウェルザリアン」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or else, it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーの自分の船の管理をしたいという願いは称賛に値する。そうでなければ、お前の執行官たちの重大な無能さを示しているぞ、ウェルザリアン」

languages.text: "Es spricht für {mf|den Freihändler, dass er sein|die Freihändlerin, dass sie ihr} Schiff in Ordnung bringen möchte. Zudem weist es auf eine schwere Inkompetenz Eurer Enforcers hin, Werserian."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or else, it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."

traits.locale_text: "Es spricht für {mf|den Freihändler, dass er sein|die Freihändlerin, dass sie ihr} Schiff in Ordnung bringen möchte. Zudem weist es auf eine schwere Inkompetenz Eurer Enforcers hin, Werserian."

languages.text: «El deseo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de poner en orden su nave le honra. Aunque podría considerarse muestra de la incompetencia de su personal de seguridad, Werserian».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or else, it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."

traits.locale_text: «El deseo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de poner en orden su nave le honra. Aunque podría considerarse muestra de la incompetencia de su personal de seguridad, Werserian».

languages.text: “行商浪人希望{mf|他|她}的船能井井有条，这一点值得赞赏。又或许，这表明你手下的执法者极其无能，韦尔森。”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or else, it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人希望{mf|他|她}的船能井井有条，这一点值得赞赏。又或许，这表明你手下的执法者极其无能，韦尔森。”

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in, gemisinde düzen sağlama arzusu ona itibar kazandıracaktır. Aksi hâlde bu durum, senin infazcılarının son derece yetersiz olduğuna delalet eder Werserian."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or else, it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir'in, gemisinde düzen sağlama arzusu ona itibar kazandıracaktır. Aksi hâlde bu durum, senin infazcılarının son derece yetersiz olduğuna delalet eder Werserian."

languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or else, it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."

languages.text: « La volonté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} de remettre de l'ordre à bord de son vaisseau est tout à son honneur. Mais on peut aussi considérer qu'elle souligne l'incompétence crasse de vos prévôts, Werserian. »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's desire to put {mf|his|her} ship in order does {mf|him|her} credit. Or else, it points to the grave incompetence of your enforcers, Werserian."

traits.locale_text: « La volonté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} de remettre de l'ordre à bord de son vaisseau est tout à son honneur. Mais on peut aussi considérer qu'elle souligne l'incompétence crasse de vos prévôts, Werserian. »
